result_list.explanation: This stage direction indicates the addressee of a speech, mentioning the Chief of the fugitives and the Prelate.
result_list.stgdir: En montrant le Chef des fugitifs et le Prélat, qui doivent être dans le fond du théâtre.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction describes a general action of looking towards the door.
result_list.stgdir: Elle regarde du côté de la porte.

result_list.explanation: This stage direction indicates the addressee of a speech, mentioning the husband of the old woman.
result_list.stgdir: Il montre le mari de la Vieille.

This stage direction describes a general action of listening.
This stage direction describes an interaction with objects, specifically showing a sword and a pistol.
result_list.stgdir: Montrant l'épée et le pistolet qu'elle a en main.
